enums.name: RecipientType
enums.doc: Represents the role of a message recipient

values.name: Primary
values.doc: Represents a primary recipient of a message

values.name: Copy
values.doc: Represents an additional (secondary) recipient of a message

values.name: HiddenCopy
values.doc: Represents a recipient of a message not visible to other recipients

text.name: Word
text.doc: Represents an individual word used in a text document. Case-sensitive.

combo.name: StatedWord
combo.doc: Represents a word used in a specific statement

props.name: text
props.doc: Text representation of this word

text.name: Delimiter
text.doc: Represents a character sequence used to separate two statements or parts of a statement

props.name: text
props.doc: The characters that form this delimiter

text.name: Statement
text.doc: Represents an individual statement made within some text. Consecutive statements form whole texts.

combos.name: SubjectStatement
combos.doc: Represents a statement made within a specific message (thread) subject

combos.name: MessageStatement
combos.doc: Represents a statement made within a specific message context

props.doc: Id of the delimiter that terminates this sentence. None if this sentence is not terminated with any character.
Time when this statement was first made

text.name: WordPlacement
text.doc: Records when a word is used in a statement

props.doc: Id of the statement where the referenced word appears
Id of the word that appears in the described statement

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index at which the specified word appears within the referenced statement (0-based)

url.name: Domain
url.doc: Represents the address of an internet service

props.name: url
props.doc: Full http(s) address of this domain in string format. Includes protocol, domain name and possible port number.

url.name: RequestPath
url.doc: Represents a specific http(s) request url, not including any query parameters

combo.name: DetailedRequestPath
combo.doc: Includes textual domain information in a request path

props.doc: Id of the domain part of this url

props.name: path
props.doc: Part of this url that comes after the domain part. Doesn't include any query parameters, nor the initial forward slash.

url.name: Link
url.doc: Represents a link for a specific http(s) request

props.doc: Id of the targeted internet address, including the specific sub-path

props.name: queryParameters
props.doc: Specified request parameters in model format

url.name: LinkPlacement
url.doc: Places a link within a statement

props.doc: Id of the statement where the specified link is referenced
Referenced link

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index where the link appears in the statement (0-based)

messaging.name: Address
messaging.doc: Represents an address that represents person or another entity that reads or writes messages.

combo.name: NamedAddress
combo.doc: Connects an email address with its corresponding human-readable names

props.name: address
props.doc: A string representation of this address

messaging.name: AddressName
messaging.doc: Links a human-readable name to an email address

props.doc: Id of the address to which this name corresponds

props.name: name
props.doc: Human-readable name of this entity, if available
Time when this link was first documented

props.name: isSelfAssigned
props.doc: Whether this name is used by this person themselves

messaging.name: MessageThread
messaging.doc: Represents a subject or a header given to a sequence of messages

props.doc: Time when this thread was opened

messaging.name: Subject
messaging.doc: Represents a named subject on a message (thread)

props.doc: Time when this subject was first used

messaging.name: SubjectStatementLink
messaging.doc: Connects a message thread subject to the statements made within that subject

props.doc: Id of the described subject
Id of the statement made within the referenced subject

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index where this statement appears within the referenced subject (0-based)

messaging.name: MessageThreadSubjectLink
messaging.doc: Connects a subject with a message thread in which it was used

props.name: threadId
props.doc: Id of the thread where the referenced subject was used
Id of the subject used in the specified thread
Time when this subject was first used in the specified thread

messaging.name: Message
messaging.doc: Represents a message sent between two or more individuals or entities

props.name: threadId
props.doc: Id of the thread to which this message belongs

props.name: senderId
props.doc: Id of the address from which this message was sent

props.name: messageId
props.doc: (Unique) id given to this message by the sender

props.name: replyToId
props.doc: Id of the message this message replies to, if applicable
Time when this message was sent

messaging.name: MessageStatementLink
messaging.doc: Documents a statement made within a message

props.doc: Id of the message where the statement was made
The statement that was made

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index of the statement in the message (0-based)

messaging.name: MessageRecipientLink
messaging.doc: Links a message to it's assigned recipients

props.doc: Id of the sent message

props.name: recipientId
props.doc: Id of the message recipient (address)

props.name: role
props.doc: Role / type of the message recipient

messaging.name: Attachment
messaging.doc: Represents an attached file within a message

props.doc: Id of the message to which this file is attached

props.name: fileName
props.doc: Name of the attached file, as appears on the file system
